subject: U.S Department of State
body:
U.S Department of State
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20524.
Your ATM Visa Card Will Be Shipped Through FEDEX To Your Address, I am MR. Antony J. Blinken, United States Secretary of State by profession. This is to inform you officially that after our investigations with the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI), Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) and other Security Agencies in the Country for this year begging 2024, we discovered that you have not receive your fund. I have made it my Second first point of call since taking office to settle all Outstanding Payments accrued to Individuals or Corporations with respect to local and overseas contract payment, Debt Rescheduling and Outstanding Compensation payment.
This is to make sure all Outstanding payments are settled this fiscal year 2024. On Behalf of the entire staff of the U.S. Department of State and the United Nations in collaboration with World Bank, we apologize for the delay of your contract payment, Winning or Inheritance funds from most of United States Countries and all the inconveniences you encountered while pursuing this payment.
However, from the records of outstanding beneficiaries due for payment with the U.S Secretary of State, 
your name was discovered as next on the list of the outstanding payment who has not yet received their payments
. Note that from the record in my file, your outstanding contract payment is ( $15,500,000 Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars) loaded in an ATM Visa Card that allows you to make a daily maximum withdrawal limit of $20,000 TWENTY Thousand Dollars)
I have your file here in my office and it says that you are yet to receive your fund valued at ( $15,500,000 Million Five Hundred Thousand Dollars) This Funds will now be delivered to your designated address or your preferred payment option.
We have perfected all modules on how to bring this fund to your house without any problem, but be aware that United Nations and the United States Government has only authorized my office to release the Sum of ( $15,500,000 Million ) to you as true beneficiary of the Fund.
Note that your loaded ATM Visa Card will be mailed to you through (FedEx) to your designated address immediately you admit full compliance to this email.
NOTE: Every documentation proof for your fund have been packaged and seal to be mailed together with your Visa Card to your address. Therefore, the only obligation required of you by the laws of the Government of United States and the financial Monetary Policy of the Supreme Court, states that; 
you as a beneficiary must officially obtain the irrevocable LEGAL STAY OF PROCEED from the Supreme Court of USA,
 as a means to justify the legitimacy, transparency and clean bill of funds from USA so that by the time your funds gets to you, no authority will question the funds as it has been legally certified free from all financial Malpractices and facets. 
The LEGAL STAY OF PROCEED is valued at a cost of just ($25usd)
The payment $25 must be sent by the listed card Apple itunes card or Staem Wallet card,
After you purchase the payment $25 Apple itunes card or Staem Wallet card, then kindly attach to us the pictures:
As soon as the above-mentioned details are received, The LEGAL STAY OF PROCEED will be secured on your behalf immediately. I need all the compliance that I can get from you to ensure we get this project accomplished. Personally, I am very sorry for the delay you have gone through in the past years. Thanks for adhering to these instructions which are meant for your sole benefit, once again accept my congratulations in advance.
Thanks for your cooperation as your quick response to this email notice with adherence to the above instructions is highly anticipated.
Yours Sincerely,
MR. Antony J. Blinken
fedexwexprewss@gmail.com
U.S Department of State
2201 C Street NW
Washington, DC 20524.

subject: Re: U.S Department of State
body:
Hello MR. Antony J. Blinken,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about the situation. I must say, it's quite a surprise to learn that there's an ATM Visa Card loaded with such a significant amount of money waiting for me.

I'm curious though, how did my name end up on this list? And why is the payment being made through an ATM Visa Card? It seems like an unusual method for transferring funds.

Also, could you please explain more about the LEGAL STAY OF PROCEED from the Supreme Court of USA? I'm not familiar with this term or its implications.

Lastly, I noticed that you mentioned purchasing Apple iTunes card or Staem Wallet card for making the payment. Could you clarify why these specific methods are required?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michelle
